short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A script that will automatically look through the reservation system on the Disneyland and DisneyWorld website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finding a reservation on the Disneyland website can be tedious. This extension will look through a selected month on Disneyland's reservation site for a restaurant and let you know which days have availabilities based off the Time of day and Party Size.
